TopicTitle: [Mission Report] The Not-so-Grand Tour; a short hop around the Kerbin system

Articles.Content:
So, I got to thinking the other day and I realized I hadn't landed on the new Mun yet. Heck, I hadn't even landed on Minmus, ever! That was a problem, one I immediately set out to solve. Stay tuned for progressing chapters as I run the not-so-grand tour of the Kerbin local system.

(future chapters will be added; first few should be up within 24 hours, just gotta take pics. Mission is already in orbit around Mun right now. I do promise this will get developed very soon )
I want to do this at some point. I'll certainly watch this thread for pointers.
Shouldn't this be in the Mission Reports subforums?
